content:
During the last day, Russian troops struck 295 beats on 8 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

The invaders made 12 RSSV-braces of the Christmas, small Tokmachka, Gulyaypol, Robot and Novodanilovka, attacked 50 drones Malinivka, Novodanilovka, Gulyaipole, Levadne and Robne.

The enemy also hit 4 airplaces in Malinovka, Novodanilovka and Robot.

229 Artudaries came across the territory of Novodanylivka, Malynivka, Robot, Levadny and other cities and villages on the Line of Fire.

There were 13 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure.

As reported by the Armyinform, March 4 Russians with cassette ammunition twicefiredThe village of Christmas district of Zaporizhzhya district, a man was killed.
title: In the Zaporozhye region nearly 300 enemy shelling per day
description: The head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov informed about it. The occupiers made 12 ...
author: Army Inform
